meanings.definition: Fellow of the Royal College of Organists
meanings.english_definition: A diploma awarded by the Royal College of Organists

examples.sentence: He obtained his FRCO diploma after years of study.
examples.translation: 彼は長年の研究の末、FRCOのディプロマを取得しました。

etymology.value: Abbreviation of Fellow of the Royal College of Organists

derivatives: ARCO (Associate of the Royal College of Organists)
